title: Bug 29765BIDI: ToolTiptext do not have Right to left Reading order
description: Bug 29765BIDI: ToolTiptext do not have Right to left Reading order
SR: Using Win2k with Arabic locale set as default locale, Using build eclipseSDKI20030115win32.zip.Using SWT components, create a button with SWT.RIGHTTOLEFT extended style,put a tool tip text that contains mixed Arabic with English text, The tool tiptext do not have a rigth to left reading order.
